worker Package¶

asana_employer Module¶

Module: asana_employer

AsanaEmployer subclasses Employer and handles all interaction between Jackalope and Asana.

class jackalope.worker.asana_employer.AsanaEmployer[source]¶

Bases: jackalope.worker.base.Employer

Connect with Asana to allow requests.

Required: AsanaAPI _asana_api a connection to the asana api dict _workspaces all the user’s workspaces, keyed on id

class jackalope.worker.asana_employer.AsanaTransformer[source]¶

Bases: jackalope.worker.base.Transformer

Handle parsing the service’s response dictionary to construct a Task and deconstructing a Task into a raw task dictionary for the service.

Required: str _embedding_field The field to use to embed other fields.

Methods

is_asana_completed()[source]¶

Return True if Asana’s completed status is True. This corresponds to states VALUE.COMPLETED and VALUE.APPROVED.

base Module¶

Module: base

ServiceWorker is the base class for all interactions with external service’s APIs. Employer (ServiceWorker) handles interactions with task doer type services and Employee (ServiceWorker) handles interactions with project management type services. Each service/API will have its own subclass.

ServiceWorker is on a Transformer to handle mappings between the service and our Task object.

ServiceWorker also provides the public facing API that the Foreman/Job can use to interact with external services.

exception jackalope.worker.base.BadTransformationError[source]¶

Bases: exceptions.Exception

Raise this Exception when Transformer is not being used correctly.

Employers do not create tasks, their external services do.

delimiter = ':'¶
key_pattern = <_sre.SRE_Pattern object at 0x10dda14b8>¶
regex = '^(\\w+?):\\s?(.*?)(?=^\\w+?:|\\Z)'¶
class jackalope.worker.base.Transformer(embedding_field=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

Handle parsing the service’s response dictionary to construct a Task and deconstructing a Task into a raw task dictionary for the service.

Required: str _embedding_field The field to use to embed other fields.

Optional: Task _task Once the Transformer has been used it stores the Task for

further access.
dict _raw_task Once the Transformer has been used it stores the Task’s
dict for further access.

Methods

get_embedded_field_value()[source]¶

Return the value of the Task’s embedded field.

get_raw_task()[source]¶

Return the raw task dict or deconstruct it from task.

get_task()[source]¶

Return the set task or construct it from the raw_task.

set_raw_task(raw_task)[source]¶

Set the raw task dict for this Transformation and make it uneditable.

set_task(task)[source]¶

Set the Task for this Transformation and make it uneditable.

transform_accessors_to_fields(task, accessors)[source]¶

Transform a list of accessors to a list of fields (str).
